ABOVE

Insider Protection.

Above turns raw activity into intent—in real time—so you can guide good people before mistakes, spot bad actors before data walks, and hand Legal/HR an evidence-grade timeline without stitching logs.

Works across SaaS, internal, and custom apps. No agents. No integrations. No waiting.
